== Description ==
Search all registered theme directories for complete and valid themes. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php search_theme_directories() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (array) : Valid themes found

== Examples ==
<!-- Need creative examples. Feel free to link to external examples. -->

== Notes ==
* Uses global: (<tt>unknown type</tt>) <tt>$wp_theme_directories</tt>
* Uses global: (<tt>array</tt>) <tt>$wp_broken_themes</tt> Holds broken themes list.

== Change Log ==
Since: 2.9.0

== Source File ==
<tt>search_theme_directories()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/theme.php}}.
